alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 10:26AM CST until March 08 at 9:26PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Owensboro, Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, and Golconda. .Water levels continue to rise along the Ohio River from Owensboro to Golconda. Crests in minor to moderate flood stage are forecast to occur early to mid week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY, MARCH 08... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Golconda. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, March 08. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 44.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 45.1 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, March 08. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
